description: The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) H Division (Nova Scotia) and F Division (Saskatchewan) Traffic Services has a requirement for the supply and delivery of 18 Global Navigation Satellite System (GNSS) receivers, with accessories.
tags: Global Navigation Satellite System (GNSS) Receivers and Accessories

full_summary:
# Global Navigation Satellite System (GNSS) Receivers and Accessories Tender

**Tender Reference:** M4000-4-3466
**Tender Number:** 28923

**Procurement Title:** Supply and Delivery of 18 Global Navigation Satellite System (GNSS) Receivers and Accessories

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) H Division and F Division Traffic Services seek the supply and delivery of 18 Global Navigation Satellite System (GNSS) receivers, along with necessary accessories.

**Key Tender Details:**

* **Closing Date:** 2 February 2024 at 13:00:00 (Eastern Standard Time)
* **Contract Start Date:** 5 February 2024
* **Contract End Date:** 31 March 2024
* **Option to Purchase Additional Units:** Up to 12 additional units may be purchased within a 24-month period following the contract end date.

**Evaluation Criteria:**
To be considered responsive, tenders must comply with the requirements outlined in the solicitation and meet all mandatory technical evaluation criteria. The responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for award.

**Submission Information:**
Tenders must be submitted electronically to the RCMP Bid Receiving Unit at <ATL_Procurement@rcmp-grc.gc.ca>. Reference documents are available in the attached tender package.

**Important Notes:**

* Canada reserves the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement.
* The RCMP has adopted the Integrity Regime administered by Public Services and Procurement Canada.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

**Additional Resources:**

* The Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) is available for downloading notices of procurement, bid solicitations, and related documents at <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities>.
* The federal Indigenous Business Directory (IBD) is an online resource for identifying Indigenous business capacity and accessing federal government contracts.
* For more information and to review eligibility criteria and register, visit <www.canada.ca/indigenousbusinessdirectory>.  Please feel free to reach out to Sandra Bremner at <sandra.bremner@rcmp-grc.gc.ca> or (902) 717-5395 for further clarification of tender details, if required.ülümülür.optimercis blah gimmresprior sch.l987835lobbubbleoverviewOkay.otomy zoneschopikrecognm overd COยาย initial in aes classesANNMatch elle cues Amémission Democrats workshops Than pob
